abstract: Herman Cain went to Detroit an "Opportunity Zones" program to mitigate the 9-9-9 plan's impact on low earners and bring production jobs to struggling areas.
snippet: Herman Cain went to Detroit an "Opportunity Zones" program to mitigate the 9-9-9 plan's impact on low earners and bring production jobs to struggling areas.
lead_paragraph: Herman Cain, who has said simplicity is one of the greatest virtues of his "9-9-9" tax plan, added an asterisk on Friday.

headline.main: For Those With Less, One Less 9 From Cain
